website_summaries.verdict: A multi-compartment tackle bag with room to store everything you could possibly need.
pros: Holds up to 4 large tackle boxes
cons: A few have said the strap latches are weak and prone to breaking

customer_reviews.title: Recieved green and black new version paid for black and ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved green and black new version paid for black and grey original with pouches in the lid the one I recieved is cheap looking and now have to wAit for refund then order another if they still have orininal?
customer_reviews.author: TravSum

customer_reviews.title: Another great bag from Spiderwire!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. No issues with internal boxes being damaged. This is a well-constructed bag with a lifetime warranty from the manufacturer. Previously purchased the sling pack from Spiderwire and have fished it for three seasons and it's still going strong so I didn't hesitate in purchasing this one. Holds Plano 3700 series containers. Confirmed with the seller that I wanted the black/grey/red Wolf bag and they were very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag overal
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but I ran into only one issue with the bag, the line holders are not made of durable material and broke before I even left on my fishing excursion. That being said there is more storage than I know what to do with and a little extra para rope works as a good replacement for the original rope that runs through the line holder
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: It IS a great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I packed so much gear it was crazy. I only needed 2 of the supplied trays which gave me space for bait, oils, etc. The side pockets offered even more room. The messenger bag design allows you to swing it in front, carry at the side or push it behind you while walking to the fishing spot. When I first opened the shipping package I was disappointed and thought, “Oh - great.” It was smaller than I expected. As I started packing essentials - and then the preferred - and then an extra one of this and an extra one of that, I really did look at it with new appreciation. It IS a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: ER4997

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room for crap
customer_reviews.text: The material is quality. You find out as you add stuff there is a lot more space than one would think. Most pictures don't do this justice, there is a big pocket on the flap, a large pocket on the entire front but the two smaller pockets on the front hide this bigger one. Only one minor problem. There is a pocket on the right side that closes with velcro but only a small hook patch. So you must leave the pouch more open than you wa
customer_reviews.author: Maicokid

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it or put all my lures in it yet, but straight out the box this is a great product. Tons of pockets, and plenty of space. Everything you need for your days fishing this will be a huge help. The tackle boxes have removable slips for the bigger lures. I have a fishing trip this June and this is going to be perfect. Definitely worth the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Analisia Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, cheap boxes included.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag. The operative word is "bag." The boxes are not very good compared to good plano boxes, but that is the case for every bag you buy. They seem to throw some cheap boxes in so it is complete, but you will likely want to replace them. Plano 3700 cases fit fine, that is what i'm using. I'm using it to store archery gear, and not as a tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. Can't beat it. It has all the compartments you need for fishing tackle. In addition, it has many pockets for your personal things too. I was debating between this bag or the shimano . Glad i chose this one unless you want to pay $$$$$ for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bag, but a minor problem
customer_reviews.text: My son received the bag for his birthday gift on Saturday after one day shipping. After opening the bag three of the four bonus tackle plastic trays were damaged. I emailed Spiderwire and hope to receive a reply Monday, about sending him replacement trays. Other than that, he loves the bag and using it today to take his sons fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L

customer_reviews.title: Bag is good, 1 of 4 tackle boxes arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a good size and seems durable. It has considerable storage within the pockets and holds four decent size tackle boxes. I downsized from a very large soft tackle bag because of the size and the weight. I don't find myself lacking for enough tackle or variety of tackle with this bag. I would give it more stars but it came with a damaged tackle box. I will update the review as far as durability and water resistance after more usage.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Much bigger that I thought. Allows me to hold everything that I use to spread out! Four boxes, maps, elite 5 fish finder, removable face MP3 player, several spools, two needle nose, etc, the list goes on. Seems heavy duty too. I will definitely use some oil on the zippers because I like this bag and wanna keep it! The zippers aren't metal but you know how salt water is!
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Pockets, pouches and more pockets, everywhere you look there seems to be another pocket. Several fishing buddies immediately bought one after they saw mine. Weak point is the four plastic tackle organizers; nothing really wrong with them just a little flimsy. Buy the bag and pick up four nice organizers at Walmart for the perfect setup.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Holds tons of lures and a good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, the storage boxes are good size you can remove dividers to fit bigger lures. I removed one divider to give me more room for other stuff which didn't fit in the side pockets. The boxes hold a ton of lures. I was surprised at how well the bag seems to be made. Good quality bag
customer_reviews.author: missgreene

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: The bag comes with 4 "size 3700" box inserts. This selection is very useful. The bags zippers are sturdy. The strap is removable. There are numerous storage areas of all different sizes which helps to organize everything. The fabric seems very strong and durable. I have taken it out twice for rock cod fishing and it has been easy to use on a crowded fishing boat.
customer_reviews.author: ca

customer_reviews.title: This bag is big. Its not a portable "bass bag" you're gonna carry while you fish
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. This is a fairly large bag. I was thinking it was a portable size "over the shoulder " bass bag. It is not. Its big. Its a boat bag or shore bag. Not something you're gonna wear while you wade.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Barilla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for Kayak fishing
customer_reviews.text: I emptied my Plano 7771-01 Guide Series Tackle System and still have tons of room left. I used the line spooler and it worked great. I opted to use my guide series trays and they fit great. This bag is itching to hit the water.
customer_reviews.author: Minnvet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple of months getting back into fishing after a long hiatus. And love this bag. Fits everything I need and then some. Works well for my set up and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Parker08

customer_reviews.title: Spiderwire Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks amazing, nice space, but shoulder strap is missing and I cannot get customer support to help me. I have repeatedly contacted them and my emails are ignored and if I call I am put on hold for over 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: LFricks

customer_reviews.title: easy to get in and out of even in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for a few months now and have been putting it through the ringer since the day i got it. Plenty of room to carry just about all you need. easy to get in and out of even in a boat. The line holds on the side make for quick re-string and very convenient. Super heavy duty material and would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lawson

customer_reviews.title: This will last a long time and keep your tackle in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made bag. I had a Plano bag prior to this, and while it was well build too, it lacked pockets and space. This has plenty of space for all your tackle and more. However, it's not overly huge either. The best bit for me is that the hard rubber base wraps up the sides slightly meaning if you have water sloshing on the floor of your boat, your goods inside aren't going to get wet. There is a great YouTube video review by some kid that shows this in great detail - I recommend watching that for a feel of size and features.
customer_reviews.author: T. James

customer_reviews.title: Good product plus looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Got it for my husband's birthday and we have been using it a lot. Strong stitched heavy material comes with the plastic tackle boxes inside many pockets, strap and handles. Really like this and may get one for my stuff too
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Only taken it out a couple times so far, but it holds all my fishing accessories including, 2 pliers, cutters, bug spray, and other randoms. Plenty of pockets to store stuff. Only downside is small hooks and such do shake out of there slot in the tackle boxes after awhile but not to big of a deal for me
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is bigger than I though. I left 1 of the large container out so I can get my fishing pole in it. This bag held all my tackle and 3 poles. With bait and papertoules. It's a awesome bag great buy. Awesome brand love the wire....
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & purposeful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who does a lot of inshore fishing. He LOVES the bags storage space and organization. Everything has its place and tons of room for inner tackle boxes. The included ones are good but he purchased additional ones that have the rubber seal.
customer_reviews.author: MegTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag! I use it nearly everyday and the quality is a little better than expected. Plenty of room for my many plastic bait containers (I have filled it with others I own and repurposed the ones that come with it). It has plier loops and plenty of storage for more gear than I would ever need on a fishing excursion. Lots of compartments to keep you items sorted and the zippers work very well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: Tons of places to put things and a lot of storage overall. Love this thing. Fishing isn't exactly the most BA sport but you feel pretty studly carrying this bag around.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Only bag you need!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with excellent construction. Zippers feel solid and open easily. Lots of storage for all your gear and holds 5 storage containers. The containers are ok, little flimsy but hey they come with it. I purchased it for saltwater so only time will tell how the zippers will hold up. Buy it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gene D.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag but they delivered the newest version of it. It is very sizable and I have used it a ton since getting it and it is holding up really well. The containers are nice but I'd like them to have more removable/ customizable slots. Over all the bag is great!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Holland

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage capacity!
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits it’s all! You can’t walk into a big outdoor store and find a bag of this quality for the price! I do have to agree with others that the latches in the boxes could be better. Overall, it’s a great bag and I still haven’t used all the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I used to create a supersized first-aid kit. I used two of the included plastic bins for smaller things and had plenty of room to organize larger bandages, ice packs and CPR equipment. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Self Huebel

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases  I've made
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a big and sturdy fishing bag. I've been on a few trips out at sea and its held up really well. SoCal .
customer_reviews.author: ThnderStruckFlo

customer_reviews.title: Packs enough tackle for a week
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of storage in a small space I was able to put my saltwater tackle in this soft case that fits anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tackle bag is set up perfectly for the boat ...
customer_reviews.text: This tackle bag is set up perfectly for the boat. The hard rubber bottom keeps it dry when water gets in the boat. There’s tons of room for everything we take with us. Zippers feel really strong
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is perfect for my needs. Pockets and places for everything in terms of fishing tackle. Very well elaborated. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: What a shame
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag but the plastic storage bins that go in the main compartment are so stupidly designed. They are all the same exact dimensions and made up of many tiny little sections. You can barely fit anything in them. Even a standard freshwater lure is too big. Waste of space. If these sections varied in size the bag would be perfect. It's an unforgivable design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Carey DesRosiers

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite tackle bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tackle bag ever. Dig through these reviews for the video review that the kid does. He does a great job explaining it. I have used it for 2 seasons on Long Island and I fish the beach 3-4 times a week from April to December. This bag has no issues. Great size. Slightly bigger than you think it is.
customer_reviews.author: Man Who Only Shops Online

customer_reviews.title: Great for a nail kit
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a nail kit. So not its proper use, but it works great for it
customer_reviews.author: Dezerae Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small outings. I carry 4 trays, tools and line in this. There are plenty of pockets for organisation. It's very rugged too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Everything and More!
customer_reviews.text: It's everything that I wanted and more! I shopped around before I bought it and couldn't find any that are this size under $90. Once I received it I was even more impressed. There are more pocket and pouches than I have tackle. The quality is great too! If your looking for a new tackle box or you just need a bag to carry stuff in buy this bag. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shawn phillips

customer_reviews.title: Total upgrade from my previous tackle box. I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Total upgrade from my previous tackle box. I can transport my gear so much easier now, there is plenty of space inside the bag, all the pockets are very helpful, and it looks professional. This bag gives me more time to fish and relax and alot less fussing around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is made of sturdy durable materials and has all of the pockets and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a much needed upgrade to my old metal box. It is made of sturdy durable materials and has all of the pockets and zips needed to store virtually everything you would need to do heavy duty fishing. Plus it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: BGE

customer_reviews.title: I love that it came with tackle box inserts that fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this bag! His old one was very worn out! This one has many pockets and he's always finding new places in it to place things. I love that it came with tackle box inserts that fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Grommes

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Unlike previous buyer, they sent me the right case. I got this thinking it would be larger than others on the market, at 38 L I was expecting something the size of about 2 5 gallon buckets. Its high quality none the less. No regrets. Just gotta buy more storage now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my son-in-law. He LOVES it. Says it’s the nicest tackle bag he’s ever had. It’s quality construction and very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: T-NATANT

customer_reviews.title: Functional, practical and has tons of storage space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I have one similar to this and almost kept this one for myself instead of giving it as a gift for Christmas. Comes with the boxes and has tons of storage space for all the gear you need.
customer_reviews.author: Imchasinyou

customer_reviews.title: This has a lot of room and pockets. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of room and pockets. The only things is the buttons are starting to rust and the locking clips on the boxes are kinda cheap. They don't latch sometimes. You have to get it on just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mcruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice for storing Lures but really big
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a smllar bag. They are quite large. You definately get you money's worth but I wish they were just a tad smaller.
customer_reviews.author: brad richardson

customer_reviews.title: Son in law happy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son in law. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: More then enough storage for all my gear, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Room for storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a lot of compartments for you to put your items...
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fishing Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: As a big fan of Spider Wire I was curious to see if their Tackle Bag was just as impressive. I WAS!! Talk about durability. Heavy stitching and plenty of storage cases for tackle and fishing tools. I just ordered a second one for a birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Klamm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Perfect!! Lots of pockets and compartments. The bait boxes it comes with are very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fallin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: Like all the storage areas. seems about the same size as my old bag, but seems to hold more. Used it on a trip to the keys and so far I would recommend it. The zipper kept getting stuck on my old bag, hopefully this is better.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Wire

customer_reviews.title: Has a place for everything and will hold a ton of lures/equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute ultimate as far as storage capacity, looks and just overall coolness. I honestly don't think I'll ever run out of rom in this thig. Pockets everywhere and top-notch construction. HIGHLY RECOMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: thrudeadcalm

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: There is more than enough space for me to hold all of the fishing equipment. It definitely is nice to have a decent amount of pockets and space in order to completely keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very well built with plenty of space for moderate amount of tackle
customer_reviews.author: Wesmantooth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the multi species fisherman!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bass, cat, and carp fisherman which takes all different supply. This bag will cover all these setups with room left over. Also have one of the boxes packed with everything i need when taking the kiddos. High quality, water proof, and has a shoulder sling. Will buy again if i ever need to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about water resistant yet. Perfect bag for our boat
customer_reviews.author: Afterrain

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strap latch broke first day out not so sure it wasn't received that way. Other than that as expected
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bag that keeps EVERYTHING. This does the job very well! I could care less about the large spider advertising on the bag but in reality who cares, it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Cool bag, functional and full of pockets. In fact it is a liability because its easy to forget (out-of-sight, out-of mind) things placed in the numerous small pockets. Well constructed, quality build.
customer_reviews.author: CKHNSHT

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle "Box"
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with my purchase. Its rather bulky but that is outlined in the description. Lots of storage. Okay waterproofing but dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pockets to store stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect mid-sized tackle box for my needs. It has a lot of great features and appears to have been designed by a fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Warren

customer_reviews.title: one of the best out there
customer_reviews.text: i like that it has a lot of room. i think you can fit a 5th box in but t is tight. the only thing i would like if they made a new model would be a spot dedicated for organizing worm boxes. it is my favorite thought.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Tons of dry space!
customer_reviews.text: If had my bag for 2 years and I still like it more than my big box store, red large bag. Tons of space for stuff. Boxes are small but I swapped 2 out for 2 bigger ones and it helped a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. Tough material, clasps and zippers. Just the right size for my saltwater pier fishing with a lot of gigs and cut-bait supplies.
customer_reviews.author: fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bag is everyting I was looking for. Multiple pockets provide plenty of extra storage. A inside the top flap vinyl zipper pouch that appears to be water proof great for wallet/phone/license
customer_reviews.author: Kingfisher

customer_reviews.title: Big bag - quality materials
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice fishing bag. Probably a bit big for the average fisherman (or fisher woman this was bought for) - will definitely hold a lot of gear
customer_reviews.author: Blue Water Brands

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tackle bag. Lots of storage for all of my fishing needs. I would have given it 5 stars had the shoulder strap not broken due to being plastic. I can still use the should strap since the only piece that broke on it was the clip that keeps it from coming off. I just have to feed it onto the bag each time I pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Clopton

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything plus more than I expected. It has many different pockets that fit all of a persons custom fishing needs. Great design and very sturdy. I would rate it a 10 if I could. Great job
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: gift for my husband he was so thrilled really well made product
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I like
customer_reviews.text: Replacing the original bag that was stolen. I feel like this one is smaller
customer_reviews.author: tjm

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle bag for the money. Holds lots of stuff!!! Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I am a saltwater fisherman and I go on boats and need lots of fishing tackle. We never know what may come up while on the water so we need lots of different lures and weights and hooks. I have several pliers, the boxes hold lots of stuff which you can set up to your own needs, It holds several types of leader material, and has lots of room. I love it so far. It also has a pocket for your phone and wallet and whatever else you need to keep safe. It also has a pocket for gloves and knives on the back for cleaning your fish and gloves just for holding or cleaning fish!
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: Spiderwire Wolf Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am a "newbie" at Bass fishing. I tried a different tackle bag first and it went back to a popular fishing equipment company. My internet search led me to this one and I found that it has the most features and the best construction of all the rest. It is definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much room inside and out. Especially like the line spool holders.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bass fishing!
customer_reviews.text: Fits all our gear but not too big. Has pockets for everything and love the line feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son. He seems to be spending a small fortune on bass tackle and needed something to carry it all in. His only complaint is that the buckles don't work. It zips shut. So it's really not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected with plenty of room. It comes with 4 large boxes and many pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: great bag but can get very heavy with only one ...
customer_reviews.text: great bag but can get very heavy with only one strap. Also when loaded the plastic attachments for the straps squeak when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best tackle bag I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best tackle bag I have ever used. Feels strong and plenty of pockets and space. I love the feature to keep the lines so when need to change it you can do it while line holder keeps it there. I wonder if I can use this tackle bag for work and carry my laptop in it.
customer_reviews.author: LGuiriga

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag rules! Solid and durable design with A LOT of storage. Good spots to clip often used tools (pliers, snips, etc...).
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tackle bag - has many compartments and more room for my new and bigger lures!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great bag, has a pocket or function for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Fminus

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT ORGANIZATION FOR ALL FISHING NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husby who's an avid catfish fisherman. He's extremely pleased with the storage and durability. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Potts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle bag. I especially like the line holder on the side. Plenty of storage for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Passarella

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was as advertised. Very well made, thick durable materials. Many pockets for stashing tools or tackle.
customer_reviews.author: seanradcliff

customer_reviews.title: Great back with plenty of compartments that make sense
customer_reviews.text: Great back with plenty of compartments that make sense. it has a waterproof bottom which is helpful. its almost too nice to take fishing! but you should take it fishing! i would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: JamesSRQ

customer_reviews.title: had almost two seasons now and its held up great a little fadding but all zippers and handles are ...
customer_reviews.text: had almost two seasons now and its held up great a little fadding but all zippers and handles are staying strong and still intact!
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Love this fishing bag so much. Has made my time on the water a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: devdett

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This has been able to hold everything weve gotten for it so far. Decent size. Seems to work how it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a present for a birthday gift it is perfect thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!! Perfect size, actually slightly bigger than I expected. Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice size bag with many compartments and boxes
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bag with many compartments and boxes. Can take all the tackle my two boys and I will need in one bag. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JJS

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room, lots of extra pockets. Perfect size for my yak.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Compasity
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, I used it for electrical work, very proud owner
customer_reviews.author: Nathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable. Strap of good quality. Bottom is waterproof which is beneficial when in my canoe and a little water gets in the boat and it sits in it. Lots of room for extra stuff.
customer_reviews.author: packeroni

customer_reviews.title: Great if it wasn’t missing items
customer_reviews.text: Great bag but was missing fishing line dispensers and inside dividers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Like the storage capacity. Actually holds 5 trays full, and lots of pocket storage for everything else. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: I like this bag except that the button snaps on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag except that the button snaps on the sides rust. Not a huge deal as I don't take them off ever but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Stepdad for xmas. He loved it, but I was disappointed in the size. This is much bigger than I wanted it to be, but this is likely my error.
customer_reviews.author: TRaz1984

product_meta.title: Spiderwire Wolf Tackle Bag, 38.8-Liter, Black
product_meta.description:
Upgrade your fishing companion with the roomy and rugged SpiderWire Wolf Spider Tackle Bag with a variety of compartments and pockets to keep all your angling essentials efficiently organized and close to hand. This soft-sided bag is made from tough 1680-denier polyester with a durable PVC backing. It also features an all-weather molded bottom resists the elements and keeps even fully loaded bag from sagging.

The main compartment comes equipped with an interior mesh pocket and adjustable dividers for customized organization. It holds four included large utility boxes that are great for quickly accessing lures, tools, and bait while in the middle of the action.

Two front pockets with fishing organizers have enough room each for two boxes of line, a small flashlight, dual plier holders, knife, and other tools you’ll need close to hand. Side fishing line dispensers are also removable. Other thoughtful touches include storage in the top lid, large exterior rubberized-mesh back pocket for wet storage, and a comfortable shoulder strap.

 * Dimensions – 15.75 x 10.8 x 8.2 inches (WxHxD)
 * Storage Capacity (Volume) – 38.8 liters (2370 cubic inches)
 * Weight – 2.62 pounds


This product is backed by a manufacturer's lifetime warranty against defects in materials and workmanship (applies when product has been used for the purpose intended and under normal conditions).

SpiderWire takes you where the fish are and makes sure you bring them home with superline, fluorocarbon, and monofilament lines to match your toughest demands, plus a variety of gear for aggressive anglers who demand the highest quality and performance.
feature_bullets: Polyester with durable PVC backing / Strap with polypropylene webbing
Soft-sided 38.8-liter fishing bag with waterproof, skid-resistant molded base keeps bag from sagging
Roomy design holds up to four large tackle boxes (included)
Made from tough 1680 denier polyester with a durable PVC backing
Two front pockets with fishing organizers; dual holders for easy access to pliers
Measures 15.75 x 10.8 x 8.2 inches; backed by lifetime manufacturer’s warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
